column4: hello, i'm trying to creat a bootable usb. Tried unetbootin, startup disk creator but still nothing. I get a syslinux error and prompt to type to a boot: thing
I have 11.10 and trying to create a 10.04
did you md5 test the ISO you downloaded?
use the links ubottu gave. You didn't test the image so you don't know if its complete and error free
found my md5sum
now what?
try startup-disk-creator
try deleting all partitions then let startup disk creator make it for you
what make and model laptop?
i know it's an amilo
works great here, can you give a PASTEBIN of the output of: lsb_release -a; uname -a; dpkg -l | egrep 'flash|gnash|swf|spark'
http://pastebin.com/YCG7X688

I managed to get most of the videos to work by replacing the libflashplayer.so file from /usr/lib/flashplugin-installer with one I found online but there are videos and sites telling me that I miss plugin and if I install the plugin or latest version geting hue problems
http://pastie.org/4039316
you have more than one flash plugin installed which causes issues
let me try this
nothing
did you install adobe-flashplugin?
reread the paste. read it ALL
how to enable the partner repo and install adobe-flashplugin?
I enabled what you said and also did sudo apt-get update; sudo apt-get install adobe-flashplugin and I get the hue thing
http://askubuntu.com/questions/117127/flash-video-appears-blue
